special_abilities.name: Cargo Hauler.
special_abilities.desc: The bosun has advantage on Strength checks.

special_abilities.name: Sea Legs.
special_abilities.desc: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

actions.name: Light HammerMelee or Ranged Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: HookMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).
